install.name: S5 Image Set Rotator
install.author: Shape5.com
install.description: This module will display sets of images with individual sources and hyperlinks in a rotating gallery.

param.name: cache
param.label: Caching
param.description: Select whether to cache the content of this module

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module, this allows individual module styling

param.name: pretext
param.label: Pre-Text

param.name: posttext
param.label: Post-Text

param.name: height
param.label: Height
param.description: Enter the height of the module.

param.name: width
param.label: Width
param.description: Enter the width of the module.

param.name: tm
param.label: Module Top Margin In Pixels

param.name: rm
param.label: Module Right Margin In Pixels

param.name: bm
param.label: Module Bottom Margin In Pixels

param.name: lm
param.label: Module Left Margin In Pixels

param.name: arrowouter
param.label: Arrow Outer Padding

param.name: arrowinner
param.label: Arrow Inner Padding

param.name: displaytime
param.label: Display Time In Seconds - Type none To Disable This Feature.
param.description: Enter the display each section will show for.

param.name: spacer0
param.default: You may display up to 5 sets of images and each set may have a maximum amount of 7 images.
param.label: Note:

param.name: numboxes
param.label: How Many Sets Of Images Would You Like To Display?

param.name: spacer1
param.label: Set 1 Image Settings

param.name: image1url
param.label: URL Of Image 1

param.name: image1link
param.label: Hyperlink Of Image 1 - Leave Blank If None.

param.name: image1target
param.label: Link Will Open In New Window or Same Window?

param.name: image1keywords
param.label: Alt Tag Keywords For Image 1 - Leave Blank If None.
